main event: A metallic, round object approximately 30-40 feet in diameter was sighted hovering in the sky over Montgomery, Alabama on May 8, 1961.
interesting points: The object was described as metallic in appearance and appeared to be hovering or stationary in the air.
The sighting was reported by a man and his wife who were driving home from downtown Montgomery.
The object was sighted in the eastern sky and remained stationary during the 2-3 minute observation period.
The weather conditions were reported as having scattered clouds with good visibility.
This report was received through a telephone call from the observer, and no further details are available.
sighted object: a metallic, round object approximately 30-40 feet in diameter
photographs: no, the report does not include any photographs
